customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Agent's Test

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow." "Although humans can be quite guarded against other humans, they aren't quite as wary of cats. And so that brings us to a story I learned about concerning the Fatui in Mondstadt..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Fatui Pyro Agent" starts with the Talent Card "Paid in Full" equipped.</color>

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Electro Hypostasis's Whisper

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow." "Our senses are very sharp, and when danger approaches, we can practically 'hear' the sound of incoming trouble. As such, all us cats tend to avoid those purplish, square-shaped fellows!"
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Electro Hypostasis" is immune to Frozen, Stun, Petrification and begins with "Elemental Lifeform: Electro" attached to it. It will heal until it reaches 6 HP upon triggering "Electro Crystal Core." At the start of the Action Phase: If the Elector Hypostasis does not have "Electro Crystal Core" attached, it can reapply "Electro Crystal Core." (This effect can be triggered twice at most.)</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Electro Hypostasis
customize.desc:
Electro Hypostasis

Code name: Aleph. A high-purity Electro entity.

Even if you win at rock-paper-scissors, Aleph is not one to admit defeat.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Serious Showdown - Electro Hypostasis's Bellow

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow." "After those purplish, square-shaped things wake form their slumber, they always start emitting a crackling sound that is loud enough to hurt our ears. I don't think humans seem to be able to hear it, however..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Electro Hypostasis" is immune to Frozen, Stun, Petrification and begins with "Elemental Lifefrom: Electro" attached to it. It will heal until it reaches 10 HP upon triggering "Electro Crystal Core." If the Elector Hypostasis does not have "Electro Crystal Core" attached, it can reapply "Electro Crystal Core." (This effect can be triggered twice at most.)</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Absorbing Prism
customize.desc:
Electro Hypostasis: Absorbing Prism

"Here's our chance!"

"Hey, it's on our side!"
